public interface SMTPClientConstants

Field Detail

CHARSET

static final Charset CHARSET
The Charset used for the SMTP protocol. This is US-ASCII (per rfc)

PIPELINING_EXTENSION

static final String PIPELINING_EXTENSION
Identifier used to detect if the SMTP Server supports PIPELINING
